Python 2016.8-?

懵懂的尝试，数据分析的开始

import gym

env=gym.make('CartPole-v0')

env.reset()

for _ in range(1000):

    env.render()

    env.step(env.action_space.sample())

Other

简单尝试，尚未深入

x=-8:0.5:8;

y=x;

[X,Y]=meshgrid(x,y);

R=sqrt(x.^2+Y.^2)+eps;

Z=sin(R)./R;

mesh(X,Y,Z)
